                    <div>
                     <font face="'arial narrow', arial, sans-serif" size="4">
                      <b>
                       <font>
                        <font color="#993366">
                         Commercial Driver Training Consultants Inc.
                        </font>
                        is a
                       </font>
                      </b>
                     </font>
                     <b>
                      <font id="ext-gen4778">
                       <font face="'arial narrow', arial, sans-serif" size="4">
                        a private, independent school.  We are affiliated with many major carriers that seek out our graduates for employment. These carriers are not financially involved in our school but they do offer the best pay and benefits the industry has to offer.
                       </font>
                      </font>
                      <font style="font-family: 'arial narrow', arial, sans-serif; font-size: large; color: rgb(153, 51, 102); ">
                      </font>

                      <div class="ic-element txtImgCombo" id="wb_element_prebblk_TAIT__1335816334273_100">

                         <font size="4">
                          OUR VISION
                         </font>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div class="comboCtr">
                        <div background="/images/clear_pixel.gif" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="ImageTAIT wb_element" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335816334273_100_02" style="" width="267">

                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="wb_element TextTAIT" contains_script="false" id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335816334273_100_03" issample="">
                         <div id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335816334273_100_03_sub_align">
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             <font color="#993366">
                              Commercial Driver Training Consultants
                             </font>
                             is committed to providing the most comprehensive driver
 training available.  CDTC is committed to your future.  Whether you are a large
 or small business or just that individual who is looking for a brighter future,
 we are committed to your future and will show you how to take full advantage of
 the skills you will aquire and the opportunities that are available in this industry.
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             When you trust us for your training needs you can trust us
 to be with you for the long haul.
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </td>
                    </tr>
                   </table>
                   <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_image__1336400062998_47" width="100%">
                    <tr>
                     <td align="center">
                      <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_image__1336400062998_47">
                       <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="" summary="image table" width="100%">
                        <tr>
                         <td align="center" valign="">
                          <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

                            </td>
                           </tr>
                          </table>
                         </td>
                        </tr>
                       </table>
                      </div>
                     </td>
                    </tr>
                   </table>
                  </td>
                  <td class="wb_col" id="wb_col__75464646678" style="" valign="top" width="33%">
                   <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101" width="100%">
                    <tr>
                     <td align="left">
                      <div class="ic-element txtImgCombo" id="wb_element_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101">
                       <div class="wb_element TitleTAIT" contains_script="false" id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_01" issample="">
                        <div id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_01_sub_align">
                         <font id="ext-gen5164" size="4">
                          EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITIES
                         </font>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div class="comboCtr">
                        <div background="/images/clear_pixel.gif" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="ImageTAIT wb_element" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_02" style="" width="235">
                         <div background="/images/clear_pixel.gif" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_02_sub_wrapper" style="" width="235">
                          <div align="center" colspan="2" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_02_sub_align" style="{display:block;float:left}">
                           <img alt="" border="0" height="156" src="images/235_truck8.jpg" style="" width="235"/>
                           <div align="center" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_02_sub_caption">
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="wb_element TextTAIT" contains_script="false" id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_03" issample="">
                         <div id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335817421755_101_03_sub_align">
                          <p id="ext-gen3688">
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             <font color="#993366">
                              Commercial Driver training Consultants
                             </font>
                             offers job placement assistance that can help you find
 employment with most of the major carrier's that we have determined take care of their
 employees in terms of secondary training, pay, benefits and home time.
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p id="ext-gen3688">
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             <br/>
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p id="ext-gen3688">
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             These carrier's seek out our
 graduates and offer employment and tuition reimbursement.
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p id="ext-gen3688">
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Some of these carrier's include:
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             <br/>
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Roehl Transport Inc.
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Maverick Transportation Inc.
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             TMC Transportation
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Schneider National
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Carter Express
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Werner Enterprises
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Boyd Brothers transportation
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Garner Transport
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             US Express
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             Star Transportation
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             NDI
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <p>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             <br/>
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </p>
                          <b>
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            Many carrier's are under review and some are rejected
 as potential employers for our students if it is determined that they don’t
 meet the high standards we set for secondary training, pay and benefits.
                           </font>
                          </b>
                          <div>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             <br/>
                            </font>
                           </b>
                          </div>
                          <div>
                           <b>
                            <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                             <p align="center" id="ext-gen26976" style="margin-top: 0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; margin-left: 0in; text-align: center; background-image: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: rgb(0, 204, 255); ">
                              <span style="font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial; ">
                               Please
                              </span>
                              <span style="font-size: 8.5pt; font-family: Arial; ">
                               <o:p>
                               </o:p>
                              </span>
                             </p>
                             <p align="center" style="margin-top: 0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; margin-left: 0in; text-align: center; background-image: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: rgb(0, 204, 255); ">
                              <span style="font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial; ">
                               call us at:
                              </span>
                              <span style="font-size: 8.5pt; font-family: Arial; ">
                               <o:p>
                               </o:p>
                              </span>
                             </p>
                             <p align="center" id="ext-gen27433" style="margin-top: 0in; margin-right: 0in; margin-bottom: 0.0001pt; margin-left: 0in; text-align: center; background-image: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; background-color: rgb(0, 204, 255); ">
                              <span style="font-size: 13.5pt; font-family: Arial; ">
                               Local-(317) 545-6852
                              </span>
                              <span style="font-size: 8.5pt; font-family: Arial; ">

                     <td align="center">
                      <div class="ic-element" id="wb_element_image__1336402687056_67">
                       <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="" summary="image table" width="100%">
                        <tr>
                         <td align="center" valign="">
                          <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
                           <tr>
                            <td align="center">
                             <a href="http://www.bbb.org/indianapolis/business-reviews/schools-business-and-vocational/commercial-driver-training-consultants-in-indianapolis-in-3029241" is_nsspace="false" target="undefined">

                     </td>

                   </table>
                  </td>
                  <td class="wb_col" id="wb_col__34728642467" style="" valign="top" width="34%">
                   <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="dz-table" id="dz-tablewb_element_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11" width="100%">
                    <tr>
                     <td align="left">
                      <div class="ic-element txtImgCombo" id="wb_element_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11">
                       <div class="wb_element TitleTAIT" contains_script="false" id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_01" issample="">
                        <div id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_01_sub_align">
                         <font size="4">
                          BUSINESS AND STATE FUNDED
                         </font>
                         <div style="text-align: center;">
                          <font size="4">
                           PROGRAMS
                          </font>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                       <div class="comboCtr">
                        <div background="/images/clear_pixel.gif" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" class="ImageTAIT wb_element" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_02" style="" width="260">
                         <div background="/images/clear_pixel.gif" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_02_sub_wrapper" style="" width="260">
                          <div align="center" colspan="2" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_02_sub_align" style="{display:block;float:left}">
                           <img alt="" border="0" height="115" src="images/260_multiple_utility_trucks.jpg" style="" width="260"/>
                           <div align="center" id="wb_element_image_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_02_sub_caption">
                           </div>
                          </div>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="wb_element TextTAIT" contains_script="false" id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_03" issample="">
                         <div id="wb_element_text_prebblk_TAIT__1335818595674_11_03_sub_align">
                          <p id="ext-gen5051">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             <font color="#993366">
                              Commercial Driver Training Consultants
                             </font>
                             have been filling the
 needs of local businesses for over twenty years.  We have a long list of client
 references that would be made available on request.  Our training and our
 tuitions cannot be matched by any of the other driving schools.
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p id="ext-gen5051">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             <br/>
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p id="ext-gen5051">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             CDTC provides
 training for the Indiana Department of Workforce Development.
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p id="ext-gen5051">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             We
 accept funding from WorkOne, the Veteran Administration, Vocational
 Rehabilitation Services, Community Action Project and
 Trade-Adjustment-Assistance offices.
                             <br/>
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             1.We offer first phase driver training for the new employee
 who needs to get their CDL license.
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             2. We provide training for both class A and class B
 commercial driver license.
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             3. We provide safety and defensive driver classes that focus
 on the new requirements set forth in the new CSA regulations governing all
 licensed CDL holders and the employers.
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                          <p style="color: rgb(66, 65, 65); ">
                           <font face="georgia, garamond, 'palatino linotype', 'book antigua', 'times new roman', 'ms mincho', serif">
                            <b>
                             4. We will customize a training program to fit your company
 needs and schedules.
                            </b>
                           </font>
                          </p>
                         </div>
                        </div>
                       </div>
                      </div>
                     </td>
                    </tr>
                   </table>
                  </td>
                 </tr>
                </table>
               </td>
              </tr>
             </table>

           </div>

                <tr>
                 <td align="center" valign="">
                  <table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
                   <tr>
                    <td align="center">
                     <a href="aboutus.html" is_nsspace="false" target="_self">

                     </a>

       </a>
       powered by Network Solutions®
